defaultTemplates.name: Smart Email Analyzer
defaultTemplates.description: Comprehensive email analysis with action items and key points
defaultTemplates.prompt: Analyze the email content and extract structured information including main points, action items, dates, participants, and next steps. Determine the overall sentiment and identify any important links or attachments mentioned. Provide a concise summary that captures the essence of the communication.

defaultTemplates.name: Meeting Summary
defaultTemplates.description: Extract meeting details and action items
defaultTemplates.prompt: Analyze this email as if it contains meeting information. Extract all participants, action items, decisions made, and next steps. Pay special attention to dates and deadlines. Identify the overall sentiment of the meeting and any critical follow-up tasks.
